did.unittitle: Bank of Germantown subscription book and ledger

bioghist.p: The Bank of Germantown opened in 1814 and was chartered with John Fanning Watson as cashier, 1814-1847.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of two volumes from the Bank of Germantown. One volume is a ledger (1814-1817) that lists the bank's daily cash balance, deposits, and checks paid. The other volume is an 1814 subscription list, giving the name of each subscriber and the number and value of shares held.
